messages.subject: De-lurking because this is too cool not to share!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! I have been lurking here for several months and learning just so much. I hope soon to have the time to post a little more. I have lots of
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone! I have been lurking here for several months and learning just so
much. I hope soon to have the time to post a little more. I have lots of questions!

This was posted on my local homeschooling list and it is just too cool:

http://www.fourmilab.ch/cgi-bin/uncgi/Earth?opt=-p&img=learth.evif

This site gives you live satellite photos of the earth. The one on this page
shows the world as it goes through daytime/nighttime. It is updated realtime
so you can actually see the night "move". I have been fascinated all night and
thought that I would pass it on...

Stephanie
